member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.GetMembersByInheritance(System.Type,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetMembers method in case when a parameter does not have option BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly. Then methods are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.GetCustomAttibutesByInheritance(System.Type,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetCustomAttributes method in case when an parameter is set for true Then attributes are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order.
member.param: A type which attributes are searched
Should inherited attributes be ordered first?

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.GetCustomAttibutesByInheritance``1(System.Type,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetCustomAttributes method in case when an parameter is set for true Then attributes are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order. Only attributes of a specified type are returned.
member.param: A type which attributes are searched
Should inherited attributes be ordered first?

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.CopyProperties(System.Object,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copying public properties from a object to a object. Object can be of different types. Properties are paired through names. Indexers and special properties are not copied. Returns names of copied properties.
